Package com.gsm.controller

Class SaleOrderController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gsm.controller.SaleOrderController
  • @Controller
@RequestMapping("/sale-orders")
public class SaleOrderController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for handling user-facing HTTP requests for the Sale Order management feature. This includes displaying the sale order list and form, and processing save/delete actions.

      SaleOrderController()

      Processes the submission of the sale order form.
      java.lang.String showSaleOrderForm​(java.lang.Long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Displays the form for creating a new sale order or editing an existing one.
      java.lang.String showSaleOrderList​(java.lang.String keyword, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)

    • Method Detail

      • showSaleOrderList

        @GetMapping
public java.lang.String showSaleOrderList​(@RequestParam(required=false)
                                          java.lang.String keyword,
                                          org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                          javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Displays the list of all sale orders, with an optional keyword search.

        Use Case: The main landing page for sale order management.

        Parameters:
        keyword - Optional search term.
        model - The Spring Model for passing data to the view.
        request - The HttpServletRequest for retrieving the CSRF token.
        Returns:
        The path to the sale order list view.

      • showSaleOrderForm

        @GetMapping("/form")
public java.lang.String showSaleOrderForm​(@RequestParam(required=false)
                                          java.lang.Long id,
                                          org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                          javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                   throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
        Displays the form for creating a new sale order or editing an existing one.

        Use Case: Called when a user clicks "Create" or "Edit".

        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the sale order to edit (null for creation).
        model - The Spring Model.
        request - The HttpServletRequest.
        Returns:
        The path to the sale order form view.
        Throws:
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - if there's an error converting the details list to JSON.

      • saveSaleOrder

        @PostMapping("/save")
public java.lang.String saveSaleOrder​(@ModelAttribute
                                      SaleOrderDto saleOrderDto,
                                      org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
        Processes the submission of the sale order form.

        Use Case: Called via POST when the user clicks "Save" on the form.

        Parameters:
        saleOrderDto - The DTO populated with form data.
        redirectAttributes - For passing flash messages after a redirect.
        Returns:
        A redirect string to the appropriate page.

      • deleteSaleOrders

        @PostMapping("/delete")
public java.lang.String deleteSaleOrders​(@RequestParam(value="selectedIds",required=false)
                                         java.util.List<java.lang.Long> ids,
                                         org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
        Deletes one or more sale orders based on a list of selected IDs.

        Use Case: Called when the user clicks "Delete" on the list page.

        Parameters:
        ids - The list of sale order IDs to delete.
        redirectAttributes - For passing flash messages.
        Returns:
        A redirect string back to the sale order list.
